about_the_game:
FEATURES:

  • Procedurally Generated Levels: Every run is different – experience fresh, thrilling missions with unpredictable challenges.

  • Unstoppable Zombie Hordes: Fight through waves of zombies, mastering your weapons and strategically using your character abilities.

  • Multiple Characters with Unique Abilities: Choose from a variety of characters, each with their own powerful abilities that can make the difference between life and death.

  • Dynamic Weapon Variety: From shotguns and rifles to explosive weapons – develop diverse strategies to take on the hordes.

  • Constant Progression: Level up during each mission, improve your gear, and upgrade your passive abilities to better prepare for escalating threats.

  • Adrenaline-Pumping Gameplay: With fast reflexes and strategic thinking, survive even the most dangerous situations.

Every round in Endless Deaths is an exciting adventure where you’ll face new challenges repeatedly. The rogue-like mechanics ensure that no two runs are the same, offering fresh opportunities to improve your survival skills with each playthrough.

Are You Ready to Escape the Zombie Horde?

Can you survive the endless onslaught and make it to the safe house, or will you become just another victim of Endless Deaths? Every mistake could be your last, but every victory brings you one step closer to your goal.

Endless Deaths offers endless replayability, thrilling combat, and constant progression that will keep you returning for more. Step into the apocalypse – if you dare!

short_description: Endless Deaths is a thrilling top-down twin-stick shooter rogue-like set in a zombie apocalypse. Fight through procedurally generated levels, upgrade your gear, and survive relentless hordes. Choose unique characters, master special abilities, and battle with a diverse arsenal of weapons!
